Shelby Ventures Inc. (TSX-V: SLY.H) is a Capital Pool Company, currently listed on the NEX Board of the TSX Venture Exchange. Management of the Company is actively engaged in assessing possible projects with a view to completing a Qualifying Transaction.

Latest News

  • November 18, 2014 - The Company announced that the Company has appointed Nitin Kaushal as a director of the Company subject to regulatory approval.
  • September 22, 2014 - The Company has now closed a non-brokered private placement consisting of 2,000,000 common shares at a price of $0.05 per share for gross proceeds of $100,000.
  • September 9, 2014 - The Company will proceed with a non-brokered private placement of up to 2,000,000 common shares in the capital of the Company at the price of $0.05 per Share to raise gross proceeds of up to $100,000.
